page.title: 08DRUG ABUSE
page.content: The biggest problem at the moment is drug abuse. There are about one million drug addicts in London alone.The most used drugs are heroine and cocaine. Some people have died after taking too much of these drugs. So now lots of people are trying to track down the dealers and hoping to ask them questions to find even more drug dealers. Also there have been programmes on the drug problem such as: Save the Scag Kids; Panorama and special documentaries at night about drugs. Some people have tried very peculiar ways of getting drugs past customs' officials such as moulding the drug into a model or the most dangerous _ swallowing it in a special, knotted bag. Another sort of drug, popular two or three years ago is glue-sniffing.
